The user gathers a large quantity of [[chakra]] to rapidly regenerate any damage done to the body.

== Usage ==
Mukade utilises this technique with his unlimited resource of Ryūmyaku chakra, repairing any and all damage done to his [[puppet]] body, and resealing his ultimate form's weak point should it be exposed, allowing him to recover from fatal wounds and severe chakra drainage. So long as he has enough chakra, he is near immortal.
